title: Authors and Citation
text: De La Cruz Libardi (2024). rctapi: rctapi: Download Clinical Trial data ClinicalTrials.gov. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://adlcruz.github.io/rctapi/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rctapi: rctapi: Download Clinical Trial data from ClinicalTrials.gov},   author = {Arturo {De La Cruz Libardi}},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://adlcruz.github.io/rctapi/}, }

title: rctapi: Download Clinical Trial data from ClinicalTrials.gov
text: Field definitions NOTE: package includes little internal error handling. Developed fulfillment HDS MSc Summer Project

what: All Field Names in a clinicaltrials.gov Record — all_fields
title: All Field Names in a clinicaltrials.gov Record — all_fields
text: Character vector containing queriable field names clinicaltrials.gov record

title: All Field Names in a clinicaltrials.gov Record — all_fields
All Field Names in a clinicaltrials.gov Record — all_fields
text: character vector names 322 queriable fields

title: All Field Names in a clinicaltrials.gov Record — all_fields
text: https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/info/study_fields_list?fmt=JSON

title: All Field Names in a clinicaltrials.gov Record — all_fields
Baseline Measures and Characteristics Fields — baseline_characteristics_fields
text: character vector

title: Baseline Measures and Characteristics Fields — baseline_characteristics_fields
text: https://prsinfo.clinicaltrials.gov/results_definitions.html#Result_Baseline   data(baseline_characteristics_fields)   Character vector containing small selection fields providing information regarding baseline measures data collected study   baseline_characteristics_fields  fields

title: Core Study Information Fields — core_info_fields
text: Character vector containing small selection relevant fields prvide overview studies

title: Core Study Information Fields — core_info_fields
Core Study Information Fields — core_info_fields
text: character vector

title: Core Study Information Fields — core_info_fields

what: Requests clinicaltrials.gov API and Returns Parsed csv Response — csv_handler
title: Requests clinicaltrials.gov API and Returns Parsed csv Response — csv_handler
text: function handles parsing csv format API response. Returns csv dataframe.

title: Requests clinicaltrials.gov API and Returns Parsed csv Response — csv_handler
Requests clinicaltrials.gov API and Returns Parsed csv Response — csv_handler
text: url formatted string passed API request

title: Requests clinicaltrials.gov API and Returns Parsed csv Response — csv_handler
code: csv_handler(url) #> Error in csv_handler(url): could not find function "csv_handler"

title: Eligibility and Population Fields — eligibility_fields
text: character vector

title: Eligibility and Population Fields — eligibility_fields
text: https://prsinfo.clinicaltrials.gov/definitions.html#Eligibility   data(eligibility_fields)   Character vector containing small selection fields providing information regarding eligibility requirements   eligibility_fields  fields

title: Extended Study Information Fields — extended_info_fields
text: Character vector containing large selection fields aimed providing complete vision studies

title: Extended Study Information Fields — extended_info_fields
Extended Study Information Fields — extended_info_fields
text: character vector

title: Extended Study Information Fields — extended_info_fields

what: Pre Loaded Field Lists, Description and Help — field_lists_df
title: Pre Loaded Field Lists, Description and Help — field_lists_df
text: dataframe name available field lists, short description, length, fields included, help link.

title: Pre Loaded Field Lists, Description and Help — field_lists_df
Pre Loaded Field Lists, Description and Help — field_lists_df
text: Dataframe

title: Pre Loaded Field Lists, Description and Help — field_lists_df
code: field_lists_df #>                                                                                               names #> all_fields                                                                               all_fields #> core_info_fields                                                                   core_info_fields #> extended_info_fields                                                           extended_info_fields #> identification_and_status_fields                                   identification_and_status_fields #> study_design_arms_groups_and_interventions_fields study_design_arms_groups_and_interventions_fields #> outcome_measures_info_fields                                           outcome_measures_info_fields #> eligibility_fields                                                               eligibility_fields #> participant_flow_fields                                                     participant_flow_fields #> baseline_characteristics_fields                                     baseline_characteristics_fields #> outcome_measures_results_fields                                     outcome_measures_results_fields #> registration_fields                                                             registration_fields #> results_fields                                                                       results_fields #> for_netmeta                                                                             for_netmeta #> for_explorer                                                                           for_explorer #>                                                                                                                                                                                                  description #> all_fields                                                                                                                                                                         All queriable field names #> core_info_fields                                                                                 Smallest election of relevant fields providing complete overview of the study without including the results #> extended_info_fields                                                                  Large selection of fields from all registration data elements (information recorded before study began and no results) #> identification_and_status_fields                  Fields including study identification, study status, sponsor, regulatory oversight, relevant health condition and a brief summary and detailed description #> study_design_arms_groups_and_interventions_fields                                                         Information about the study design, number of arms or groups, and types of interventions involved. #> outcome_measures_info_fields                                                                                                                                     Information about all outcome measures used #> eligibility_fields                                                                                                                                            Information regarding eligibility requirements #> participant_flow_fields                                                                                                     Information regarding the progress of participants through each stage of a study #> baseline_characteristics_fields                                                                                                  Information regarding the baseline measures and data collected in the study #> outcome_measures_results_fields                                                              Information regarding the outcomes measured and statistical analyses performed as well as the resulting values. #> registration_fields                                                                      Large selection of registration data elements fields, these elements are all uploaded before the study is completed #> results_fields                                                                                                                                              Large selection of results data elements fields. #> for_netmeta                                                                                                                                                                         Focused on study results #> for_explorer                                                                                                                                                 Optimised for use with shiny app in rctexplorer #> what: Get Up To 20 Study Fields — get_fields
title: Get Up To 20 Study Fields — get_fields
text: function takes search expression character vector 20 less field names returns one dataframe parsed API response.

title: Get Up To 20 Study Fields — get_fields
Get Up To 20 Study Fields — get_fields
text: search_expr string following querying guidelines clinicaltrials.gov fields list character vector 20 field names. max_studies number indicating many studies ones match search expression returned.

title: Get Up To 20 Study Fields — get_fields
code: get_fields(expr = 'cardiomiopathy', fields = core_info_fields) #> Error in get_fields(expr = "cardiomiopathy", fields = core_info_fields): unused argument (expr = "cardiomiopathy")

what: Get Content of API Response — get_response_content
title: Get Content of API Response — get_response_content
text: Helper function response_content parameter == TRUE. Returns decoded content query respone. Limited 20 fields.

title: Get Content of API Response — get_response_content
code: get_response_content(   search_expr = search_expr,   fields = fields,   max_studies = max_studies )

title: Get Content of API Response — get_response_content
text: search_expr string following querying guidelines https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/gui/ref/syntax https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/gui/ref/expr fields character vector field names. field names available https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/info/study_fields_list?fmt=JSON, "all_fields", "get_vector_all_study_fields()" max_studies number indicating many studies ones match search expression returned.

title: Get Study Fields — get_study_fields
text: function takes search expression character vector number field names returns one dataframe merged parsed csv API response.

title: Get Study Fields — get_study_fields
code: get_study_fields(   search_expr,   fields,   max_studies = 500,   response_content = FALSE )

title: Get Study Fields — get_study_fields
text: search_expr string following querying guidelines https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/gui/ref/syntax https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/gui/ref/expr fields character vector field names. field names available https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/info/study_fields_list?fmt=JSON, "all_fields", "get_vector_all_study_fields()" max_studies number indicating many studies ones match search expression returned. response_content Logical indicating whether returned object unparsed decoded, content API query response. return first 20 fields fields argument. Suited troubleshooting.

title: Get Study Fields — get_study_fields
code: get_study_fields(expr = 'heart attack',fields = all_fields) #> Error in get_study_fields(expr = "heart attack", fields = all_fields): unused argument (expr = "heart attack")
